title: ICE: `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value, def_path_hash_map.rs:18:85

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body: ### Code This issue seems to be related to incremental compilation, because yanking the code to a separate binary compiled successfully. I zipped the entire directory but it's a bit too large to upload... ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` PS Z:\Projects\aoc> rustc --version --verbose rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` PS Z:\Projects\aoc> rustc
